name: Rolling Zoms
description:
You are a zombie trying to get flowers for your zombie girlfriend. You must call upon your zombie pals by using the space bar to collect all the flowers (you gotta touch the flowers at the same time, or the power of friendship won't work, and you can't progress to the next level). Don't forget, zombies lose their basic motor skills, so you have to navigate the world by rolling. Good Luck!

Credits for Unity Assets used:
